divs: Sighting Detailsorbs observed from south side looking west. orbs rising from horizon to form large triangle staying in formation. orbs rose straight up from horizon in single formation spred out into a triangle formation. they were pulsing and traveled a while apparently ascending gradually. exactly 16 ufos appeared . they would dissappeaer in flight not to appear again. one ufo remaing motionless at the end of the event for about 3 min. began to move away into west north west going ubtill i lkost site. there are three other witnesses.
